domain.name: Politician

text:
@toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock It depends how that figure was reached. What is considered a 'test'? Do 100,000 kits sent out count as 100,000 tests?
Knowing how underhand this government is, only a clear explanation on how they have achieved the target will suffice.
